articles.description: Even with record numbers of properties up for auction at the weekend, capital-city clearance rates remained at at sky high levels, a true test of buyers' appetite for property, experts say.
articles.content: Australias surging real estate market cleared another hurdle at the weekend, recording sky high clearance rates in the major capital cities despite a record number of properties going under the hamme… [+4603 chars]
